text: [Music]
AWS support is a one-on-one Fast
Response Channel staff 247 365 around
the globe by experienced technical

time by connecting with AWS experts that
will help you build your application in
the cloud plans are month-to-month and
you can cancel at any time what makes
AWS support different from other support
organizations is first and foremost we
were born out of an extremely customer
Focus company which is amazon.com we
take a very proactive Approach at
support instead of the traditional
reactive uh you know I have something
broken can you help me fix it we hire
great Engineers we are training those
people we're enabling them with great
technology but really what we're trying
to do is communicate the mission that
we're on and find the kinds of people
that want to be on that mission that
mission to help customers having the
ability to pick up a phone and call
someone who can either answer your
question right away or get you an expert
on the phone very very quickly to answer
a question
is uh is fantastically helpful for large
Enterprises like ours customers who
select business or Enterprise level
support can interact with Engineers via
phone chat email and live screen share
we'll help configure common third-party
software provide architecture guidance
and Grant access to AWS trusted advisor
and our support apis it's been an
excellent experience we work with them
very closely they were able to answer
many of our questions um and have
followed up afterwards to make sure that

that we had the process within the team
that we needed to move forward it was
not just a matter of getting a sport

advisers to us they were guiding Us in
the right uh in the right
direction AWS trusted advisor has given
us uh a real uh good benefit in terms of
um in terms of cost saving specifically
um we when we review the reports we are
able to see which how many instances are
underutilized how many instances are not
um are not using full capacities AWS
trusted adviser analyzes your usage of
AWS compares the results to best
practices and recommends options that

and improve system reliability and
performance we built trusted advisor
because customers were just asking for
uh best practice guidance so frequently
we then realized over time that we can
actually build software that we can use
technology to really go further than we
ever thought we could it tells you the
problem areas do you need to look into
it and resolve those issues before they
really become a
problem if we didn't have Enterprise
level support from AWS it would be a lot
harder to resolve incidents quickly
which would affect our customers and we
would be using AWS a lot less
efficiently but the second thing and and
this is probably what we didn't expect
initially is that Beyond just resolving
incidents it's helped us optimize our
use of
AWS Enterprise level support provides
critical 15minute response times a
dedicated technical account manager that
knows your application business reviews
custom billing reports and expedited
routing for critical issues that can
result in quicker mitigation and
resolution Times Enterprise support gave
us uh great opportunity to have a good
balance between cost saving and
Enterprise level service without
Enterprise support HDFC would be
focusing on the wrong thing we need to
focus on product Innovation and delivery
um that's kind of our Co competency so
